description:
The ShieldUI DateTimePicker component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows you to select a date with a time part and perform an action. 
The control contains internally ShieldUI Calendar widget which allows you to navigate through days, months and years. The time part can be set via the ListBox control. 
The DateTimePicker has rich client side API for interaction with the component.
name: ShieldUI DateTimePicker component
